Keep only common feature names

Source: R/functions-MSnSet.R
commonFeatureNames.Rd

Subsets MSnSet instances to their common feature names.

commonFeatureNames(x, y)

Arguments

x

An instance of class MSnSet or a list or MSnSetList with at least 2 MSnSet objects.
y

An instance of class MSnSet. Ignored if x is a list/MSnSetList.

Value

An linkS4class{MSnSetList} composed of the input MSnSet containing only common features in the same order. The names of the output are either the names of the x and y input variables or the names of x if a list is provided.

Examples

library("pRolocdata")
#> Error: package ‘MSnbase’ required by ‘pRolocdata’ could not be found
data(tan2009r1)
#> Warning: data set ‘tan2009r1’ not found
data(tan2009r2)
#> Warning: data set ‘tan2009r2’ not found
cmn <- commonFeatureNames(tan2009r1, tan2009r2)
#> Error in inherits(x, "MSnSetList"): object 'tan2009r1' not found
names(cmn)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'cmn' not found
## as a named list
names(commonFeatureNames(list(a = tan2009r1, b = tan2009r2)))
#> Error in commonFeatureNames(list(a = tan2009r1, b = tan2009r2)): object 'tan2009r1' not found
## without message
suppressMessages(cmn <- commonFeatureNames(tan2009r1, tan2009r2))
#> Error in commonFeatureNames(tan2009r1, tan2009r2): object 'tan2009r1' not found
## more than 2 instance
data(tan2009r3)
#> Warning: data set ‘tan2009r3’ not found
cmn <- commonFeatureNames(list(tan2009r1, tan2009r2, tan2009r3))
#> Error in commonFeatureNames(list(tan2009r1, tan2009r2, tan2009r3)): object 'tan2009r1' not found
length(cmn)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'cmn' not found
